attributes.action: Stop Guns and Cannons Being Fired In Schools,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Last week I was walking to the shops along a country lane, without warning there was a traumatic explosion, I was shocked, felt ill and had palpitations and shakes,

On investigation, some schools encourage history learning in some places by subjecting students to war time experiences, firing cannons, muskets, rifles,throwing of grenades and thunderflashes, I believe this is totally unacceptable,

My local school should respect the parents wishes of the dead children of former conflicts, including dunblayne.

Please support my petition to get gordon brown to stop guns and cannons being fired in schools,to glorify previous conflicts

Stop Guns and Cannons in Schools- It makes sense?>
